messages.text:
LGTM after reverting rm change

http://codereview.appspot.com/5841054/diff/3001/doc/install.html
File doc/install.html (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5841054/diff/3001/doc/install.html#newcode83
doc/install.html:83: rm -rf /usr/local/go
i'd leave this as rm -r. the -f flag will hide failures, and you'd like to know whether the command succeeded

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go/

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=b5a8aeb000eb ***

doc/install: remove reference to "Go Tutorial"

R=golang-dev, r
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5841054

subject: code review 5841054: doc/install: remove reference to "Go Tutorial"
